stages.logText: The Duleian road is closed. The guard at the checkpoint told me there is an ongoing investigation, but would not say more. He suggested I talk to the Sargent at the camp back up the road a little.

I spoke to the Sargent at a camp by the side of the Duleian road. He told me the road is closed because of an ongoing investigation. I persuaded him that I can help, so he gave me a pass to get through the road block.
I showed the guard at the road block my pass from the Sargent, and I can now go through.
